ovdesc.p: This application holds all the BED transaction entries for a given account and bank date. Entries are held in the fixed format that they are received in on the PTT tape.
This application is used to generate the BED diskette and journal from the FT.BED.DOWNLOAD application.

desc.p: Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Specifies the account number and system date on which the Bed entries were received from the PTT.
2-14 numeric account number or 3-10 alphanumeric characters account Mnemonic. followed by 1-8 digit system date. (Mandatory input)
The BED DATA as received from the PTT.
128 alpha numeric characters in the specified PTT format.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 1 characters may be entered.
The following values are permitted: A B
Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
